Reviews.Title: “worst hotel i have ever stayed at”

Reviews.Content: booked internet owners booking closing dirty cracks tiles toilet noisey toilet cistern soap shower holder staff looked left cope worst hotel stayed apart location positive avoid plague

Reviews.Title: “Only stay if you are visiting the museums”
Reviews.Author: neasup
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel reading web site undergone refurbishment truth closing hopefully owners due refurb wasnt able information awful tiniest sink cracks tiny shower fixed wall thrown televisions staff guests understandable didnt serviced 2nd day wasnt deal expect service breakfast ok didnt hot cos wasnt terrible shame location hope owners spend serious money

Reviews.Title: “Hope to return soon”
Reviews.Author: GaryTemple
Reviews.Content: central location cafés restaurants bars close hand natural history museum stayed moat house chose location decor pleasantly surprised hotel decorated throughout becoming grosvenor kensington jacuzzi comfortable reception staff stay choices breakfast day plus wireless access pleasant 3 night stay definitely choose stay

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and Neutral”
Reviews.Author: AFA86
Reviews.Content: expect hotel star truly 3 star hotel price location extremely favorable definitely stay business travel purposes leisure pampering relaxing stayed extremely clean bathroom

Reviews.Title: “Decaying chique”
Reviews.Author: CarolinePenny
Reviews.Content: understand lot people criticise poorly maintained interior hotel plaster ceiling little untrustworthy walls definitely paint job mention windows look theyre hundred overlooked playground primary school bit noise day falls quiet evening terrible clean spacious towels bedsheets smelling fresh ive stayed lot worse price yes western hotel price range wheres charm character poetry stay reception hall impressive thanks chandelier hallways nice wide elevator slides hint movement staff indeed overly friendly polite job pleasant efficient stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I've ever been to!”
Reviews.Author: Ali_fct
Reviews.Content: ive booked hotel ridiculously cheap price website arrived woman reception reservation manager available offered price significantly booked shabby dirty rest hotel found light toilet reception change hour angry complaining roomwhich bad light 100 staff ive met spanish speak little english ive complained answered spanish rude worst hotel ive location recommend mind

Reviews.Title: “OK for the price”
Reviews.Author: Marcus1234
Reviews.Content: little tired decoration night stayed perfectly happy check quick staff overly friendly am friends staff floor onto balcony overlooking road noisy times summer windows night clean little worn edges bathroom jacuzzi bath didnt minute correct breakfast plentiful juice orange offer watered coffee unpleasant location close museums south kensington price stay

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: tf68
Reviews.Content: location amazing south kensington underground staff nice spanish sometimes communication wasnt stayed week suited hardly yes clean staff little eager clean morning 9am hear knocking door trying sliding chain mornings woke clean exploring city late nights tired morning door tell sleeping woud 2nd day didnt buffet ok wouldnt included found beautiful little cafe 5 minute walk hotel called le pain quotidien thew breakfast amazing 3rd morning day recommend hotel using sleep everyday hotel stay day tv didnt globes blew bed anway ok fixed soon tv didnt care tired fell asleep

Reviews.Title: “VERY DISAPOINTING HOTEL - NOT 3 STARS”
Reviews.Author: AUSTRAVELLER2010_10
Reviews.Content: disapointing hotel major renovations arrived awful viewed internet site staying 7 days change seen advertised internet fuss changed triple 3 seperate beds instead dark double bed 2 bunk beds 1 1 top ladder tall teenager travelling able fit properly bunk bed comfortably wish sleep 7 days bunk bed internet site advertised triple 3 separate beds booking arrived check english breakfasts included stay bit disappointing variety 3 star hotels bit shabby cracked tiles bathroom couple cupboard doors close properly looked dated worn renewal updating curtains holes legs stools broken etc etc stay location close museums natural history museum victoria albert museum science museum harrods south kensington station surprisingly meant nights sleep staying dump definitely 3 stars hotel investment bring scratch glad leave stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: bagpackers2
Reviews.Content: read reviews somewhat apprehensive couldnt pleased staff reception pleasant helpful able store luggage ready spacious clean bright plenty storage space bathroom thoroughly clean bed roomy comfortable couldnt fault plenty choice breakfast hot cold substantial english breakfasts elsewhere variety offer acceptable overall excellent value money definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Not at all satisfied.”
Reviews.Author: FoodieNEngland
Reviews.Content: reception staff helpful pay â£20 deposit paid advance charges incurred meals offered breakfast service mini bar norfolk bar badly refurbishing redecorating bedside table english breakfast consisted beans cold scrambled egg cold overcooked hash browns didnt cheap sausages cold choice bacon tomatoes mushrooms fried bread fried eggs etc enjoyable stay definitely value money

Reviews.Title: “Not perfect, but great value at the price we paid”
Reviews.Author: Mattinbrum
Reviews.Content: yes hotel refurbishment basics spacious clean equipped size bath plenty hot water beds comfortable nights sleep found reception staff helpful efficient english wasnt language breakfast worth range hot cold items buffet cup coffee
